name: Space Avoider (dizi-works)
description:
Use the arrow keys/wasd to avoid the asteroids and reach the end goal!

This was game I made for My First Game Jam. It's been a while since I last made a game, and I felt like I had to get my momentum back with something simple. I spent a week making this, trying different things and seeing what worked and what didn't. There are a lot of things that I didn't have time to add, but all in all I'm glad I managed to get a game out this month...
